attributes.action: ALL Political Parties Should Get Equal Air-Time On The BBC TV and Radio
attributes.additional_details:
No matter how small a political party may be they should be guaranteed in law that they will have equal air-time on BBC Radio and TV.

Let's have legislation to that effect passed before the next general election, to ensure the democractic right of all political parties in the United Kingdom to equal air-time to put over their proposals fully to the electorate.
